title: Episode #26 - Before AD & BC, How Did People Classify Years & Time?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
This time, Emma and Janina take a deep dive into the history of time and how we measure it! How did people in the pre-Christian world mark dates and years? What other calendars are there? Did the time period between 340AD and 911AD even exist??

Featuring:
Lots of Kings and Emperors! 🤴🤴🤴
Water clocks and sundials! 🕰️⏰
A grand and ridiculous conspiracy theory! 🕵🏼‍♀️🤔

This audio has been updated due to a prior error

Sources: https://historyissexy.com/show-notes/episode-26-time
